Description: Gold finger-ring; triple hoop of pale gold wires, branching out at the bezels, which are in the form of barley-corns.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (967)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
